name: releaseorchestrator
description: Manage and orchestrate Azure DevOps release pipelines
helpMarkDown: For aditional information and support please refer to <https://github.com/dmitryserbin/azdev-release-orchestrator> project repository.
author: Dmitry Serbin

inputs.name: EndpointType
inputs.label: Azure DevOps Endpoint Type
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Select endpoint type to connect Azure DevOps: 
Integrated = default 'SystemVssConnection' service endpoint for 'Project Collection Build Service' user account; 
Service = user-defined personal access token (PAT) service endpoint 

Note: requires 'View releases', 'View release definition', 'Create releases' and 'Manage deployments' release pipeline permissions

inputs.name: ConnectedService
inputs.label: Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select service endpoint for Azure DevOps account

inputs.name: ProjectName
inputs.label: Project Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select target project from the list or specify project name

inputs.name: DefinitionName
inputs.label: Release Definition
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select target release definition or specify definition name

inputs.name: ReleaseStrategy
inputs.label: Release Strategy
inputs.helpMarkDown: Create new release, target existing or latest release in the release definition

inputs.name: ReleaseName
inputs.label: Release Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select target release (shows last 25 releases) or specify release name or ID

inputs.name: ReleaseStages
inputs.label: Release Stages
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target specific release stages (comma separated)

inputs.name: DefinitionStagesFilter
inputs.label: Filter Definition Stages
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use default or target specific release definition stages

inputs.name: DefinitionStages
inputs.label: Definition Stages
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target specific release definition stages (comma separated)

inputs.name: ReleaseTagFilter
inputs.label: Filter Release Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable target release filtering by tag name

inputs.name: ReleaseTagName
inputs.label: Release Tag Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify tag name filter of target release

inputs.name: ArtifactTagFilter
inputs.label: Filter Artifact Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable target release filtering by primary artifact tag name

inputs.name: ArtifactTagName
inputs.label: Artifact Tag Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify tag name filter of primary release artifact

inputs.name: SourceBranchFilter
inputs.label: Filter Source Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable target release filtering by primary artifact source branch name

inputs.name: SourceBranchName
inputs.label: Source Branch Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify branch name of primary release artifact source. Default = 'refs/heads/master' (build artifacts) or 'master' (Git artifacts)

inputs.name: StageStatusFilter
inputs.label: Filter Stage Status
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable target release filtering by stage(s) deployment status

inputs.name: StageStatus
inputs.label: Target Stage Status
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify target release stage status filter. Default = Succeeded

inputs.name: ReleaseVariables
inputs.label: Release Variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override release variables of the target release pipeline when creating a new release. Specified release variables must be configured to be 'settable at release time'. In 'Name=Value' format, special characters supported, new line separated

inputs.name: IgnoreFailure
inputs.label: Ignore Failures
inputs.helpMarkDown: Suppress errors and set task result to partially succeeded in case of failure. Default = false

inputs.name: ApprovalRetry
inputs.label: Approval Retries
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify number of attempts to retry (with 1 minute delay) approving target release stage deployment (if unsuccessful) before failing. Default = 60

inputs.name: UpdateInterval
inputs.label: Status Update Interval
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify number seconds to wait before next release deployment status update. Default = 5 (i.e. every 'X' seconds)
